user_stories.title: As a user, I want to identify core agent functions
user_stories.description: List all primary functions and capabilities of the agents that require testing.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Identify Core Agent Functions
Then List all primary functions and capabilities of the agents that require testing.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to brainstorm positive test scenarios
user_stories.description: Develop test cases for expected successful agent behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Brainstorm Positive Test Scenarios
Then Develop test cases for expected successful agent behavior.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to brainstorm negative test scenarios
user_stories.description: Develop test cases for expected agent behavior in error conditions or invalid inputs.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Brainstorm Negative Test Scenarios
Then Develop test cases for expected agent behavior in error conditions or invalid inputs.
